Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 34th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/11/2015...
Had first career hit on 5/12/2015, off Tobias Ortiz (BRO)...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/8/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/5/2019 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/7/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
